judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Robebts, Pomeeoy and Baebiebi, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
Mr. Justice Baebieei took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: George W. Gekas, with him Eml J. Melman, and Melman, Gekas and Nicholas, for appellant.
Walter K. Bwartzhopf, Jr., with him Rhoads, Binon & Reader, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Lock Estate.
Argued January 21, 1971;
reargued November 16, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Robebts, Pomeeoy and Baebiebi, JJ.
George W. Gekas, with him Eml J. Melman, and Melman, Gekas and Nicholas, for appellant.
Walter K. Bwartzhopf, Jr., with him Rhoads, Binon & Reader, for appellee.
March 20, 1972:
